Module capstone
Package capstone

Class Project

java.lang.Object
capstone.Project
public class Project extends Object
Contains numerous non-static variables and represents the data stored for each Project the company has on file

  • Constructor Details

    • Project

      public Project(String projectNumber, String projectName, String buildingType, String adress, String erf, double totalFee, double totalPaid, String projectDeadline, Person architecht, Person contractor, Person customer, boolean isFinalized, String completionDate)
      Constructor for Project class
      Parameters:
      projectNumber - for reference
      projectName - as title
      buildingType - for type of building
      adress - physical site address
      erf - the ERF number of the plot
      totalFee - the total amount being charged
      totalPaid - the amount paid to date
      projectDeadline - format is LocalDate compatible
      architecht - Person object with architect role
      contractor - Person object with contractor role
      customer - Person object with customer role
      isFinalized - a boolean to show completeness
      completionDate - format is LocalDate compatible

      public String[] formatData()
      Creates an array and populates each index with an attribute that is of type string.
      Returns:
      an array with each Project attribute as string

      public String getSimpleDetails()
      Returns the Name and Number of a project for simple display purposes
      Returns:

    • getIncomplete

      public static String getIncomplete(List<Project> projectList)
      Returns a string with project name and number for the objects not marked as complete
      Parameters:
      projectList - is a list of all Project objects
      Returns:
      string with simple details of all incomplete projects

    • getOverdue

      public static String getOverdue(List<Project> projectList)
      Returns a string with project name and number for the objects not marked as complete AND whose deadlines are passed

      projectList - is a list of all Project objects
      Returns:
      string with simple details of all incomplete projects
